info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 5 at 3:13AM EDT until April 7 at 1:25PM EDT by NWS Wilmington OH
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers...
Great Miami River at Sidney.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Great Miami River at Sidney.
* WHEN...From this morning to early Monday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Water approaches properties along Canal Street in Port Jefferson, with flooding worsening in Custenborder Field in Sidney. Flooding impacts yards and parking lots along Riverside Drive. Flooding extends through much of Berger Park. Flooding encroaches to near mobile homes along Brooklyn Avenue on the east side of the Great Miami.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 13.0 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/iln.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON
